items.sentence: I was surprised to find out that Tom could play the trombone.
When was the last time you walked more than three kilometers?
Would you rather work for a large company or a small company?
Mary\'s closets are full of clothes she hasn\'t worn in years.
I suspect Tom won\'t tell Mary what happened to him yesterday.
It wasn\'t as difficult to do as I thought it was going to be.
It\'ll take me at least three hours to do my homework tonight.
Mary is the most beautiful girl I\'ve ever actually talked to.
I can\'t imagine how Tom has put up with Mary all these years.
I can\'t imagine what my life would be like without my family.
